profile.name: Felix S Klock II
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at GE HealthCare | Passionate Developer with a Focus on Rust and JavaScript
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a strong passion for software development, language design, and concurrent programming. Proficient in multiple languages and technologies, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at GE HealthCare
description: Designed and implemented multiple Rust-based systems for efficient data processing and analysis.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy large-scale JavaScript applications.
Developed and maintained tools using cargo and rustc, improving the overall development workflow.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various projects for clients across different industries, utilizing JavaScript and TypeScript.
Maintained open-source repositories, contributing to the development of multiple projects.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of several open-source projects.
Collaborated with other developers to resolve issues and improve code quality.
